roleset.name: work on more than one task at once
roleset.note: MULTITASK-V NOTES: Framed by Claire (from multitask.01-v)

role.descr: multi-tasker, person doing more than one thing

example.name: Paint as multi-tasker
example.text: The installment includes Jane Callister's punchy abstract paintings, which skillfully exploit the capacity of paint-2 *PRO*-2 to multi-task.
